thread.title: A One of a Kind Brand New Product for the Car from RestMyNeck Systems
thread.title_full: A One of a Kind Brand New Product for the Car from RestMyNeck Systems

title: A One of a Kind Brand New Product for the Car from RestMyNeck Systems
text:
Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed A One of a Kind Brand New Product for the Car from RestMyNeck Systems For the millions of cars on the road and the millions of passengers. For the millions of road trippers, young and old alike. Get the Flash Player to see this player. Install the RestMyNeck car pillow. Featured Video 
Install the RestMyNeck car pillow. YouTube Video 
RestMyNeck side sleeper pillow for the car. For the millions of cars on the road and the millions of passengers. For the millions of road trippers, young and old alike. TORONTO, ON, October 20,   There's a great new innovation that awaits your car. It's practical and much needed for passengers in the car. People of all ages will benefit from this new product. It's called the RestMyNeck car neck pillow that supports the head and neck when sitting in the car. It is specially useful during long road trips so that you can lean your head and neck sideways and rest comfortably in the car. It's different from other travel pillows as the RestMyNeck car neck pillow prevents you from falling sideways when sleeping in the car specially when the car turns. Other travel pillows do not keep your head upright as they fall with you while sleeping in the car. It's fastened securely to the car head rest with no tools needed. It adjusts to various heights of passengers. To parents who plan a road trip with kids : rest assure that your kids will not fall to awkward positions in the back seat while sleeping in the car. To all road trippers out there: plan a road trip and do not forget to bring your RestMyNeck side sleeper pillow for the car. The RestMyNeck car pillow is newly patented under USPTO 8888187. Visit www.restmyneck.com to get your sample of this great new innovation.RestMyNeck auto pillow system is the only pillow system of its kind anywhere in the world. It is a patented design licensed to RestMyNeck Systems, a designer, developer and manufacturer of new and innovative consumer products. RestMyNeck 14-3650 Langstaff Road, Suite 237 Woodbridge, Ontario
